chapter.paragraph: property value + rent cost on watch list for a correction.
The decline of american manufactory industry makes 147 metropolitan areas underpopulated:Flint, Detroit, Youngstown, Atlantic City, Beaumont.

Five places that could grow if people move there. Comparing grow and prosperity report, 100 biggest metro areas, 2015 affordability index and jobs quality. As a result you get five cities: Cincinnati, Pittsburgh, Columbus, Omaha, Minneapolis.
There is a slowdown: house contract dropped from 214 (in 2015) to 150 (in 2016). The new trend is to break penthouses into smaller accommodations.

Cuomo (Governor) and De Blasio (Mayor) have different solutions for affordable housing. Cuomo suggests fiscal cuts for $1,5 billion in five years. De Blasio proposes to increase taxes only for whom earn more than $50 millions a year.
